ILBShaderHandle Struct Reference

This reference page is linked to from the following overview topics: Creating a Scene, Creating Physical Materials.

Search for all occurrences

#include <beastapitypes.h>

Class Description

Handle for an OSL shader.

Examples:

examples-physical/code/common/samplescommon.h, examples/code/shbaking/shbaking.cpp, include/beastapi/beastapitypes.h, include/beastapi/beastmaterial.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/include/beastwrappers/beastshaderwrapper.h, and maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastmanagerwrapper.cpp.
